title: 중복암호화
content:
[[=]]
**<<** [[[aiad-homescreen|허브]]] | [[[alert-lockdown-initiated|제I부]]] | [[[command-query-separation|제II부]]] | ##blue|제III부: 중복암호화##  | [[[clock-multiplier|제IV부]]] | [[[null-terminating-string|제V부]]] **>>**
[[/=]]
----
[[include info:start]]
**중복암호화**
**저자:** [[*user LurkD]]
**원작:** http://www.scpwiki.com/superencipherment
**역자:** [[*user Salamander724]]
[[include info:end]]

[[module css]]
.hover {
}
.hover:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span { display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: #FFF;
    border: 2px solid #34B;
    color: #000;
    padding: 1em;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
불렀나요?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
알렉산드라, 제17기지가 깜깜무소식이다. 최근 몇 시간 동안 연결이 가능했나?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
최근에 연결을 시도해본 적이 없네요. 얼마나 오래 두절상태 중인가요?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
이제 겨우 3시간 지났지만, 그정도면 단순 통신장애는 고치고도 남을 시간이지.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
글라송은 아무 말이 없구요?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그래. 3차 채널 중 하나를 통해 그에게 패킷을 넘겨줄 수 있는지 확인해 봐라. 알겠지?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
할 수 있습니다. 대응반은 언제 부를 거죠?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
이사관은 4시간을 더 기다려 보겠다고 한다. 그래도 응답이 없으면 강제로 들어가야지. 아마 MTF 한두 부대를 대동할 거다. 표준적인 절차지.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
알겠어요, 그럼 제 쪽에서 할 일을 하겠습니다.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
난 다른 일들을 처리하러 가야 한다. 나한테 진행상황을 계속 알리라고.

자네 괜찮나?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
네, 괜찮습니다.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
좋아.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; text-align: right; margin: 0 0 10px 10px; width: 240px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 3pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
.
[[div style="text-align: center; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
::연결 끊김::
[[/div]]
.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[>]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex_sad_0.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/>]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그쪽에서 무슨 일이 벌어지고 있는 거야, 글라송? 흐으으음.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
/create PACKET#SITE17 @glacon -1
[[div style="text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
@@> message ATTN glacon@@
@@> please respond@@
@@> need update on site17@@
@@> its alex@@
@@> /end@@
[[/div]]
/send SECURE 55.223.698.37
@@@@
@@@@
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex_worried.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="text-align: right; margin: auto; width: 240px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
발송 중...
[[div style="text-align: center; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/18-1.gif]] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/18-1.gif]] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/18-1.gif]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #ca612c; font-size: 3pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
.
[[div style="text-align: center; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
::요청 시간 만료::
[[/div]]
.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
/create PACKET#SITE17 @allusers
[[div style="text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
@@> message ATTN site17@@
@@> please respond@@
@@> need update on status@@
@@> from site19@@
@@> /end@@
[[/div]]
/send SECURE 55.223.698.37
@@@@
@@@@
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/superencipherment/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
